name: Store Hours for WooCommerce
author: BizSwoop a CPF Concepts, LLC Brand

sections.description:
The best way to set a custom hours schedule for your online store! Disable visitors from being able to checkout during closed hours, enable checkout when the store is set to open. Set a holiday schedule. Display Status In a Box. It’s as easy as that!

Are you a restaurant or business only open for select hours? Do you need a simple way to disable orders from being accepted outside select hours in the day?

The Store Hours Manager Plugin enables/disables the WooCommerce checkout functionality to only allow orders based on your hours schedule. If the store hours are marked as closed, no orders can be processed and WooCommerce checkout is disabled for the customer. The Plugin allows custom daily schedules with multiple hourly option time slots to provide flexibility based on your business needs. Ex., Close your store for lunch, open back up for dinner.

Core features:

  • Customize daily and hourly schedule functionality for store hours
  • Display sitewide box pop-up to show store ordering status to visitors
  • Configure display trigger by site, or by visit of user
  • Configure days closed holiday calendar for the year
  • Automatic enabling and disabling checkout functionality based on custom time schedules
  • Force override schedule to instantly disable checkout functionality for rush times
  • Management mode for admin and content creators

PLUS+ FEATURES! LOGOS, STYLE & EXTRA POWER **(PREMIUM ADD-ON)**

  • Set Dismiss Options Including Duration and Dismiss Status
  • Powerful Updated Store Hours Display Widget Now Included!
  • Add Your Logo or Icon To Either Notification Types
  • Advanced Shortcodes Included for Embedded Schedule
  • Choose Notification Type Pop-up Box or Bar
  • Customize Colors With Palette Selector To Match Branding
  • Manage Floating Widget and Alert Notice based upon Schedule
  • Display the Configured Weekly Schedule in a Pop-up for Customers
  • Display a Countdown to Show Customers the Next Store Order Status Change and More…
  • Buy Now Store Hours Plus

PICK-UP, TAKE-OUT, CURBSIDE, DELIVERY & SHIP FUNCTIONALITY **(PREMIUM ADD-ON)**

  • Allow customers to select a location take-out or pickup date/time, local delivery date/time or ship at checkout
  • Enable a scheduler for the pickup and delivery time slots
  • Pickup and delivery range uses Shipping Zones and Methods to enable restrictions
  • Buy Now Pickup Delivery Scheduler
sections.installation:
1. Upload Store Hours Manager to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the Plugins menu in WordPress
  3. Now select from the WooCommerce menu Store Hours and edit your settings
  4. Customize your schedule, notification and actions unique to your store requirements
  5. If you have any issues contact. https://bizswoop.com/support/

sections.reviews:
Very Helpful for stores

By sepicompanywork on March 8, 2024

Easy to use, works fine

annoying alert

By zamaan on July 7, 2023

This plugin is a nice one. but very annoying stuff.

That alert windows make the plugin unusable. also no any tool tip comments for options. overall because of the alert box, i just remove the plugin.

Cannot enable store hours

By Nilpo on May 30, 2023

After doing a force override on store hours, you can no longer disable the option rendering the entire thing pointless. My store is now permanently closed.

It works but some functions are not clear

By Cezar Ayran (ayrancd) on September 10, 2021

My store was 24 hours OPEN and just a day later I found out that the option Turn-on Force Override is enabled it'll keep your store open no matter what schedule you set up which is fine but it should have something explaining that...

Nerfed

By miclovin on June 25, 2021

This was a good plugin until they nerfed it with an annoying update.

if must pay, you must say! you are not stupid!!

By Nord Digital (nordkasse) on March 20, 2021

no say to pay, costs my too much time! BAD!!!

BAD UPDATE EVER

By adrianrus9 on March 19, 2021

..... bad update...

Core Free Features now must be paid for

By nwiseman on March 9, 2021

Bizswoop didn't announce to any users of the free plugin that the latest update would effectively make all the core features of the free plugin now sit behind a paywall. On top of this they changed the free behaviour so it keeps popping up with the alert message to customers, effectively making the plugin (and your website) useless. Pretty average business practices!!! As soon as there is a competitive product to the now paid version we will be switching.

Unusable Free Version

By nikxmystic on February 19, 2021

I loved this plugin until the last update. I wish I had never upgraded. When the store is closed, there used to be a site-wide notification at the bottom and you could dismiss it. It worked great. But now it turned into a pop-up modal that renders your website unusable. You're able to dismiss the pop-up, but with the free version, it comes back in 1 minute or less repeatedly. It's not worth sacrificing the rest of your site for this feature. They might as well make it a paid plugin and get rid of the free version.

Big Mistake Guys

By 4tcmedia on February 18, 2021

Cheeky buggers have essentially made pop up consistent in modal mode on update which makes website totally unusable. It's inline with installing a virus onto your website - there is no difference. They push you to buy premium to remove the pop up. I understand the need to begin monetizing, but the approach this company took is disgusting. DISABLING store hours still doesn't remove the pop up. Very Very Very dissapointing guys. If you set option to allow close of popup, it just ignores you and keeps appearing. If you actually just allowed people to close the pop up once it comes up, it would be enough for my clients to purchase a premium version - instead, we have totally removed your plugin and will be sending our money to another company. BAD I switched to using Woocommerce OPEN/CLOSE plugin. Seems to work well with a pro version that hides cart etc. Atleast the free version gives you a message bar that doesn't break your site.

short_description: Create Custom Open & Close Store Schedules for Automatically Enabling & Disabling Customer Checkout Functionality for WooCommerce.
description:
The best way to set a custom hours schedule for your online store! Disable visitors from being able to checkout during closed hours, enable checkout when the store is set to open. Set a holiday schedule. Display Status In a Box. It’s as easy as that!

Are you a restaurant or business only open for select hours? Do you need a simple way to disable orders from being accepted outside select hours in the day?

The Store Hours Manager Plugin enables/disables the WooCommerce checkout functionality to only allow orders based on your hours schedule. If the store hours are marked as closed, no orders can be processed and WooCommerce checkout is disabled for the customer. The Plugin allows custom daily schedules with multiple hourly option time slots to provide flexibility based on your business needs. Ex., Close your store for lunch, open back up for dinner.

Core features:

  • Customize daily and hourly schedule functionality for store hours
  • Display sitewide box pop-up to show store ordering status to visitors
  • Configure display trigger by site, or by visit of user
  • Configure days closed holiday calendar for the year
  • Automatic enabling and disabling checkout functionality based on custom time schedules
  • Force override schedule to instantly disable checkout functionality for rush times
  • Management mode for admin and content creators

PLUS+ FEATURES! LOGOS, STYLE & EXTRA POWER **(PREMIUM ADD-ON)**

  • Set Dismiss Options Including Duration and Dismiss Status
  • Powerful Updated Store Hours Display Widget Now Included!
  • Add Your Logo or Icon To Either Notification Types
  • Advanced Shortcodes Included for Embedded Schedule
  • Choose Notification Type Pop-up Box or Bar
  • Customize Colors With Palette Selector To Match Branding
  • Manage Floating Widget and Alert Notice based upon Schedule
  • Display the Configured Weekly Schedule in a Pop-up for Customers
  • Display a Countdown to Show Customers the Next Store Order Status Change and More…
  • Buy Now Store Hours Plus

PICK-UP, TAKE-OUT, CURBSIDE, DELIVERY & SHIP FUNCTIONALITY **(PREMIUM ADD-ON)**

  • Allow customers to select a location take-out or pickup date/time, local delivery date/time or ship at checkout
  • Enable a scheduler for the pickup and delivery time slots
  • Pickup and delivery range uses Shipping Zones and Methods to enable restrictions
  • Buy Now Pickup Delivery Scheduler
